pli-tv-pvr2.15:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.1: Because of consenting to physical contact of the seven (ways for) the deciding (of a legal question) by how many decidings are the offences … (_see_ Prv.2.7).
pli-tv-pvr2.15:3.1: Concluded is the Seventh Chapter: on Deciding
